name: Instagram - selectable
description: Description Instagram recently blocked users from selecting text on PCs. That's unfair! With this style, you can select and copy any text in the description of a post. How to contribute Go to GitHub, clone this project and start your changes. If you want to use styles from source code, then create new style in Stylish extension and put source code in opened window. How to use this style? You need Stylus extension installed on your browser to use this style. Disclaimer All the code is present "AS IS".
